resources.string: You can log in by clicking on the profile button in the top right. Then use your email and D.o.B.
How do i book an appointment?
By navigating to the "book appointment" page, then simply selecting an available date/time and selecting book.
Is it possible to re-arrange an appointment?
Yes. You can alter an appointment using the "change appointment" page.
Am i able to alter my details on the application.
Not right now. In these early stages the only way to alter your details would be to call your surgery.
Can i quickly diagnose my own symptoms?
You could use the symptom checker page to get an idea for your current illness. Be wary, though, as these may not always be so accurate.
Click on a question to reveal its answer.
